results.description: With Rugby World Cup matches cancelled because of Typhoon Hagibis, we look at other times the weather had a crucial impact on sporting events.
results.shortTitle: When the weather changed a sporting result
results.title: Typhoon Hagibis: When the weather changed a sporting result

altText: ফাইনাল খেলার দিনে প্রবল বজ্রপাত এবং বৃষ্টির কারণে পেরুজিয়ার স্টাডিও রেনাটো কুরি আক্ষরিক অর্থেই ভিজে ছুপছুপে হয়ে গিয়েছিল।

results.description: The UK's biggest women-only grass-court event will be downgraded from next summer, with Wimbledon backing a tournament in Berlin.

results.description: На првом месту, наравно, Новак. А како и да не буде после онаквог финала и историјске победе. Ипак, било је ту још занимљивих ствари.

results.description: People have to "wake up to the greatness" of Novak Djokovic after he won his 16th Grand Slam, says Boris Becker.
results.title: Novak Djokovic deserves more respect after Wimbledon victory - Boris Becker

results.description: England's stunning victory in a champagne super over was a very English way to win a World Cup, writes Tom Fordyce.

results.description: Roger Federer says letting slip two championship points in his Wimbledon final loss to Novak Djokovic was "an incredible opportunity missed".

results.description: Wimbledon champion Novak Djokovic says a near five-hour final against Roger Federer was his most "mentally demanding" match.
results.title: Novak Djokovic: Wimbledon champion says final was 'different level' mentally
